source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Fabulous Candle Making For All - Candler  Level 1 Certified
items.headline: Learn to make beautiful candles, soy candles, bees wax candles, candle kits, wicks, wax, colour, scented, new from old.
objectives_summary: Learn how to make candles at home
Learn how to work with soy way, bees wax and others
Learn about the different types of candle wicks and how to use them.

items.title: School of Origami: Learn How to Fold and Master Origami
items.headline: Learn How To's and Techniques to Turn Paper into Beautiful Origami Creations! Printable Origami Designs Included!
objectives_summary: Fold 24 traditional origami masterpieces
Foundational understanding of origami terminology and origami folding

items.title: Drawing From Photographs - Grid Drawing Method Made Simple!

visible_instructors.title: Robin Slee | Art | Illustration | iPad | Software Development
visible_instructors.display_name: Robin Slee | Art | Illustration | iPad | Software Development
visible_instructors.name: Robin

items.headline: How to draw. Realistic pencil drawings. Easy Step by Step Grid Method. Explore your creativity. Ideal for beginners!
objectives_summary: Draw Amazing pencil drawings by hand!
Use Photographs as a source of inspiration
Develop your basic drawing skills

items.title: How to Paint Flowers with Watercolor | Pink Roses
items.headline: Step by Step Paintings: How to Paint Pink Roses with Watercolor
objectives_summary: Watercolor supplies need for this painting
How to use watercolor tubes as a watercolor cake
An overall strategy for painting light-colored flowers

items.title: Kids Sewing 101
items.headline: A sewing course for children ages 6-14
objectives_summary: Know how to use a sewing machine safely
Use an iron safely
Identify the parts of a sewing machine

items.title: The Greeting Card Business: Design and Sell Your Own Cards

visible_instructors.title: Kate Harper
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Greeting Card and Gift Designer
visible_instructors.name: Kate

items.headline: Learn about working in the greeting card industry.
objectives_summary: Create a card collection.
Six ways to work in the greeting card industry
Three parts of a card.

items.title: The Complete Character Drawing Masterclass for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students
visible_instructors.name: John

items.headline: Learn to Create multiple Characters Archetypes using Marker Art from Animals to Fantasy to Everyday regular People
objectives_summary: Developing your designing talent
Art creation

items.title: Mixed media painting workshop for beginners (Let Loose!)
items.headline: Easily create an abstract painting using only acrylics, marker and brushes. No experience needed!
objectives_summary: Discover & enjoy the process of painting even if you have NEVER painted before!
Build a colourful background and have fun in the process!
Add a variety of marks to give interest to your painting

items.title: How to do a hand poked / stick and poke tattoo
items.headline: Fundamentals and techniques for doing a professional hand poked tattoo
objectives_summary: How to do hand poke / stick and poke / machine free tattoos
Tattoo design, equipment and sterilisation, stencils, tattoo technique and aftercare

items.title: Gel Candles – How to Make Amazing Candles Quickly & Easily

visible_instructors.title: Shona O'Connor
visible_instructors.job_title: Crafter, Maker of Soap, Hair, Bath and Body, Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Shona

items.headline: Gel candle making - use candle gel to make dramatic, colourful scented candles with amazing designs, colours & effects.
objectives_summary: Make candles with or without bubbles
Create scene candles using embeds
Make layered candles using colours and gel wax alone, or multiple waxes

items.title: The Face Anatomy Drawing Course: Anatomy To Render

visible_instructors.title: Alejandro Encisso
visible_instructors.job_title: For Those Who Have The Insaciable Need To Draw
visible_instructors.name: Alejandro

items.headline: Take your portraits to another level understanding the anatomy of the face. With 3d models and Drawing examples
objectives_summary: The Anatomy of the skull
Diference betwing female and male skull
Facial Muscle Anatomy

items.title: How to paint creatively from photos
items.headline: Get creative with your photos and develop your own style as you use my easy five step method of painting.
objectives_summary: The best way to paint from a photo
How to use a photo as inspiration for your creativity

items.title: Abstract Techniques Revealed Vol. 2 Create Large Modern Art

visible_instructors.title: Gino Savarino
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional abstract artist, gallery owner and instructor
visible_instructors.name: Gino

items.headline: A fun, loose and carefree approach to creating abstract contemporary paintings.
objectives_summary: Learn easy techniques to create beautiful abstract paintings.
Have the confidence you are looking for to create a contemporary painting without spending a fortune on tools and materials..

items.title: Realistic Watercolor Portraiture
items.headline: Paint a realistic watercolor portrait from a photograph using tracing techniques and comprehensive painting instruction.
objectives_summary: Paint a realistic watercolor portrait from a photograph using simple tracing techniques.
Drawing realistic features of the face: Eyes, Nose and Mouth.
Painting with watercolors the features of the face.

items.title: Basics Of Melt & Pour Soap
items.headline: Learning and understanding these types of soap will give you a strong knowledge base to create your own unique soaps.
objectives_summary: The design and creation of melt and pour soap from soap base.
This course do not cover hot process, cold process, nor manufacturing soap base.
Soap base can be acquired by purchasing either online or at your local hobby store.

items.title: Alcohol Ink Flowers (The Perfect Petal)

visible_instructors.title: Virginia Crowe
visible_instructors.job_title: Living Free at Heart (Alcohol Ink Artist)
visible_instructors.name: Virginia

items.headline: Creating the Perfect Petal in Alcohol Ink
objectives_summary: How to create Flowers with Alcohol Ink

You will learn a technique that I created using specific tools to create beautiful petals out of Alcohol Ink.  The course goes into detail on petal creation.  You will learn how to shape the petals, use the tools and how to prevent and fix common mistakes
